title: Israeli Jets Bomb Sites in Yemen Linked to Iran-Backed Houthis
content: The strike was retaliation for a drone attack launched from Yemen a day earlier, which evaded Israel’s defenses and hit a building in Tel Aviv, killing one person.

title: Did Police in Kenya Catch a Serial Killer or Coerce a Confession?

title: The Buried Book That Helped Ukraine’s Literary Revival

title: Conflict in Western Congo Leaves Thousands Dead and Displaced
